required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Food Effect Study to Assess Pharmacokinetics of Hemay005 in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Open-labeled, Single Dosing Study to Assess Food Effect on the Pharmacokinetics of Hemay005 in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of food on the PK of a single dose of 52.5 mg Hemay005 in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 ,72hours post-dose on day 1 and day 8
pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 ,72hours post-dose on day 1 and day 8
pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 ,72hours post-dose on day 1 and day 8
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to the last quantifiable concentration

primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 ,72hours post-dose on day 1 and day 8
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero extrapolated to infinity

primary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 ,72hours post-dose on day 1 and day 8
pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 ,72hours post-dose on day 1 and day 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events, serious adverse events

intervention.description: Hemay005 tablets will be taken orally in dose of 52.5mg at fasted dosing on period one followed by fed dosing on period two.
Hemay005 tablets will be taken orally in dose of 52.5mg at fed dosing on period one followed by fasted dosing on period two
